Summary: Round black objects exiting cloud with black contr
divs: Sighting DetailsWitness stated that she, her husband, and her daughter were heading eastbound onI-96 on Sunday March 11, 2001 when she saw what appeared to be 3 black objectsexiting a cloud. The cloud appeared smooth with no ridges. All of the objectswere leaving a trail of smoky stuff in the sky, which stayed there.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Brighton
There were no other sightings in Brighton on or around March 11th 2001
